briefTitle: Efficacy and Mechanisms of Naltrexone+Bupropion for Binge Eating Disorder

armGroups.label: NB Medication
interventionNames: Drug: Bupropion Hydrochloride, Naltrexone Hydrochoride Drug Combination

interventions.name: Bupropion Hydrochloride, Naltrexone Hydrochoride Drug Combination

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Binge Eating Frequency
outcomeMeasures.description: Binge eating will be assessed by interview (Eating Disorder Examination) and the primary outcome is frequency of binge episodes in the past month, comparing baseline and post-treatment. Change is defined as the change in frequency from baseline to post-treatment."

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent BMI Change
outcomeMeasures.description: BMI was calculated using measured height and weight. We report percent BMI change using the following formula: (\[BMI at posttreatment\] - \[BMI at baseline\])/\[BMI at baseline\]. Negative values indicate loss.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Binge Eating Frequency
outcomeMeasures.description: Binge eating will be assessed by interview (Eating Disorder Examination) and the primary outcome is frequency of binge episodes in the past month, comparing post-treatment and 6 month post-treatment follow up. Change is defined as the change in frequency from post-treatment to 6 months post-treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Binge Eating Frequency
outcomeMeasures.description: Binge eating will be assessed by interview (Eating Disorder Examination) and the primary outcome is frequency of binge episodes in the past month, comparing post-treatment and 12 month post-treatment follow up. Change is defined as the change in frequency from post-treatment to 12 months post-treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Body Mass Index
outcomeMeasures.description: BMI was calculated using measured height and weight. We report percent BMI change using the following formula: (\[BMI at 6 month followup\] - \[BMI at posttreatment\])/\[BMI at posttreatment\]. Negative values indicate loss.

outcomeMeasures.title: Body Mass Index
outcomeMeasures.description: BMI was calculated using measured height and weight. We report percent BMI change using the following formula: (\[BMI at 12 month followup\] - \[BMI at posttreatment\])/\[BMI at posttreatment\]. Negative values indicate loss.
